SUMMARY: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

Class Ext.ux.netbox.string.TextFieldOperator

Extends Ext.ux.netbox.core.Operator.
Defined in TextFieldOperator.js

This is the class that implements an operator that wants always a TextField even if availableValues are available.

Field Summary
object editor
          With this operator I want always a TextField, even if there are available values This is the variable that contains the editor
